text: taco bell hack number three mexican
pizza hack if the mexican pizza is no
longer at taco bell while you're
watching this here's a hack to bring it
back order two flour tortillas
substitute tostada it should be 80 cents
and look like this now order a bean
burrito add seasoned beef and add
tomatoes on the side the bean burrito
comes with red sauce and cheese two
ingredients already on the mexican pizza
make sure to ask for those to be on the
side now spread the bean and beef
mixture onto the tostada place a tostada
on top and add red sauce cheese and
tomatoes the temperature of the red
sauce actually comes hot which will melt
the cheese it's the mexican pizza
did i do it wrong and you've got the
closest thing to a mexican pizza without
it being a mexican pizza do this hack
it's a lot of work don't get ripped off
i don't know
